original_text: Then I will cause you to you to fall deep down into the earth. You will be part of the world of dead people who lived a long time ago. You will join other cities that became heaps of stones long ago. You will remain there. You will never again be a city in the world where people are alive. Then I will cause you to you to fall deep down into the earth. You will be part of the world of dead people who lived a long time ago. You will join other cities that became heaps of stones long ago. You will remain there. You will never again be a city in the world where people are alive.
korean_text: 내가 너를 구덩이에 내려가는 자와 함께 내려가서 옛적 사람에게로 나아가게 하고 너를 그 구덩이에 내려간 자와 함께 땅 깊은 곳 예로부터 황폐한 곳에 살게 하리라 네가 다시는 사람이 거주하는 곳이 되지 못하리니 살아 있는 자의 땅에서 영광을 얻지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: Then I will cause you to fall deep down into the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 너를 땅 깊숙이 떨어뜨리겠다.

sentences.original_text: You will be part of the world of dead people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 죽은 사람들의 세계 일부가 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: who lived a long time ago.
that became heaps of stones long ago.
You will never again be a city
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다시는 도시가 되지 못할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: in the world where people are alive.
